org.m2ci.msp.jtgt

Class Tier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.m2ci.msp.jtgt.Tier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntervalTier, PointTier

    public abstract class Tier
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to represent a tier in the textgrid
